# 系统版本 | what version of the system
- e.g. `Windows 11 pro 21H2 22000.318`

# 工具是否为最新？ | is the newest version of the tool you using ?
- `Yes` or `No`

# 使用什么功能时遇到bug | which mode you use
- e.g. `查找词典` or `find`

# 怎么触发？ how bug works
- e.g. `Fisrt,.........Second,............`

# 触发了啥？ what bug works
- e.g. `闪退` or `let system BSOD`

# tools应该怎样？ what it will be if all ok
- e.g. `提示123456这个密码已被泄露` or `tell me 123456 as a password is leaked`

# 给点建议？ some advices please
- 非必填 need not to fill this
